entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 8:12 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
